name: McGinley Media
overview:
McGinley Media provides businesses with custom iPhone, iPad, Blackberry, Droid, and HTC applications.

Each application is designed with the end-user in mind. McGinley Media works with clients to develop customer-facing apps, creatively integrating advertising and data collection into fun, ‘sticky’ apps.

Projects have included real-time commodities pricing iPhone/iPad applications for a financial services firm, a mobile application providing the fastest checkout lane information and advertising specials for customers of a national grocery chain, and student scheduing apps for various school districts.

McGinley Media provides both custom, proprietary applications and mobile advertising software, as well as licenses for pre-built apps and software programs.

McGinley Media has been featured in a number of publications, with the most recent article appearing in the upcoming September 2010 ‘Street Smarts’ column of Inc. magazine.
